dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT shipment_gid,TO_CHAR(start_time,'yyyy/mm/dd') sdate, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ref_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid) purchase, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_coo_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid) country_of_origin, (SELECT trm.transport_mode_xid FROM transport_mode trm WHERE trm.transport_mode_gid = sh.transport_mode_gid) transport_mode, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_pmc_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid) payment_terms, 'USD' currency FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN location loca ON sh.dest_location_gid = loca.location_gid AND loca.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT shipment_gid,NVL(TO_CHAR(start_time,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'Data Missing in System') sdate, NVL(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ref_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid),'Data Missing in System') purchase, NVL(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_coo_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid),'Data Missing in System') country_of_origin, NVL((SELECT trm.transport_mode_xid FROM transport_mode trm WHERE trm.transport_mode_gid = sh.transport_mode_gid),'Data Missing in System') transport_mode, NVL(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_pmc_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid),'Data Missing in System') payment_terms, 'USD' currency FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN location loca ON sh.dest_location_gid = loca.location_gid AND loca.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT sh.shipment_gid, loc.location_name con_locname, locadd.address_line con_add, loc.city con_city, loc.province_code con_state FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid AND loc.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' INNER JOIN location_address locadd ON loc.location_gid = locadd.location_gid AND locadd.line_sequence = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT sh.shipment_gid, NVL(loc.location_name,'Data Missing in System') con_locname, locadd.address_line con_add, loc.city con_city, loc.province_code con_state FROM shipment sh LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid AND loc.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' LEFT OUTER JOIN location_address locadd ON loc.location_gid = locadd.location_gid AND locadd.line_sequence = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT sh.shipment_gid, loc.location_name pur_locname, locadd.address_line pur_add, loc.city pur_city, loc.province_code pur_state FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sh.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_line ol ON oob.order_base_gid = ol.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON ol.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid AND loc.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' INNER JOIN location_address locadd ON loc.location_gid = locadd.location_gid AND locadd.line_sequence = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND ROWNUM = 1 AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT sh.shipment_gid, NVL(loc.location_name,'Data Missing in System') pur_locname, locadd.address_line pur_add, loc.city pur_city, loc.province_code pur_state FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sh.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_line ol ON oob.order_base_gid = ol.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON ol.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid AND loc.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' LEFT OUTER JOIN location_address locadd ON loc.location_gid = locadd.location_gid AND locadd.line_sequence = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND ROWNUM = 1 AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT sh.shipment_gid, loc.location_name org_locname, locadd.address_line org_add, loc.city org_city, loc.province_code org_state FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN location_address locadd ON loc.location_gid = locadd.location_gid AND locadd.line_sequence = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT sh.shipment_gid, NVL(loc.location_name,'Data Missing in System') org_locname, locadd.address_line org_add, loc.city org_city, loc.province_code org_state FROM shipment sh LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON sh.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location_address locadd ON loc.location_gid = locadd.location_gid AND locadd.line_sequence = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DECODE((:transport_mode),'BULK',1,'HOPPER',1,ssul.packaging_unit_count) packages, itm.description, NVL((SELECT ssuref.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.NUM_PACKAGES' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid),0) quantity, NVL((SELECT obr.ob_refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON orel.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),0) price, (NVL((SELECT ssuref.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.NUM_PACKAGES' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),0)) * (NVL((SELECT obr.ob_refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON orel.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),0)) total FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item itm ON pi.item_gid = itm.item_gid WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT DECODE((:transport_mode),'BULK',1,'HOPPER',1,ssul.packaging_unit_count) packages, NVL(itm.description,'Data Missing in System') description, NVL((SELECT ssuref.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.NUM_PACKAGES' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid),0) quantity, NVL((SELECT obr.ob_refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON orel.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid),0) price, (NVL((SELECT ssuref.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.NUM_PACKAGES' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid),0)) * (NVL((SELECT obr.ob_refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON orel.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid),0)) total FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item itm ON pi.item_gid = itm.item_gid WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'FMDay, Month DD, yyyy ')) curr_date FROM DUAL
